verbose_text: It was reported previously that cells with knockdown of TfR1 became more resistant to erastin induced cell death and that siTfR1 RNAi significantly inhibited serum dependent necrosis, which was subsequently determined to be ferroptosis.
evidence: TfR1 became more resistant to erastin-induced cell death               and that siTfR1 RNAi significantly inhibited serum-dependent necrosis
